summary: Mod adds Dwarven Armor without pauldrons and backplate. It's little lighter and provides worse protection than normal one. For now it's only cuirass, but I plan to make whole set. You can craft it using normal Dwarven Armor.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=20]Medium and Light Dwarven Armor[/size][/b]

The female medium gauntlets I just added are different style from male ones (i know texture isn't ideal on it, it's test). Tell me which one you prefer please.

New medium boots use modified CaBaL120 texture, so I suggest using his textures for the rest of armor: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24398/?

Mod adds:
- Medium Dwarven Armor
- Medium Gauntlets
- Medium Boots
- Light Dwarven Armor
- Dwarven Bracers

Medium one is without pauldrons and backplate, gauntlets are without chunk of metal on back. Light one is without any plates besides breastplate, gauntlets replaced by bracers. Armors class is heavy for medium version, light for light version.

You can craft armor using normal Dwarven Armor.
Gauntlets using Dwarven Gauntlets.
Boots using Dwarven Boots.
Bracers using Dwarven Gauntlets and Hide Bracers.
You don't have to have any smithing perks.

I plan to make whole set.
author: cyrkon

files.name: Medium and Light Dwarven Armor
files.changelogHtml:
added light version, craftable like medium one
removed requirements for crafting armor
